name: ExpressSafe
signal_source: Creative app reviews show concerns about 'authenticity and safety' with platforms where users question 'how authentic are these interactions'
description: Creative sharing app with built-in identity verification to ensure authentic human creators without fake accounts
target_user: Digital artists who want to share work in communities free from bots, fake accounts, and algorithmic manipulation
pain_point_evidence: Users express concerns about 'fake profiles, bots, and accounts' and question authenticity of interactions on creative platforms
core_loop: Export verified status to other platforms
differentiation: Identity verification vs. anonymous posting, human-only vs. bot-filled communities
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced verification, priority support, and verified badge features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic verification, premium for advanced features and priority status
